summary: A player base cut into a glacier. Includes map marker and fast travel enabled. Offers crafting utilities, three NPC vendors with double standard money for easy unloading, no respawn chests, and visualy pleasing surroundings.
descriptionHtml:
A player base cut into a glacier. Includes map marker and fast travel enabled. Offers crafting utilities, three NPC vendors with double standard money for easy unloading, no respawn chests, and visualy pleasing surroundings.

Installation: cop to Skyrim > Data

This is my first mod, would appreciate any feedback. Please do not use without permission.

Version 1.1
Added cooking pot
Added bedroll
Expanded castle portion of mod as glacial dungeon, a door links the two areas, the dungeon is bare for now.
author: Damndragon
